Description.Chinese: 如果你摧毁了许多AI/海盗的船只/建筑，而它要求停火/和平，它不会向你要钱。
Description.English: If you destroyed many ships/buildings of AI/pirates and it is asking for CeaseFire/Peace, it won't demand money from you.
Description.French: If you destroyed many ships/buildings of AI/pirates and it is asking for CeaseFire/Peace, it won't demand money from you.
Description.German: Zerstört man viele Schiffe/Gebäude der KI/Piraten bzw greift sie stark an, bieten sie einen Waffenstillstand/Frieden an. In dieser Situation verlangen sie nun kein Geld mehr dafür.
Description.Italian: If you destroyed many ships/buildings of AI/pirates and it is asking for CeaseFire/Peace, it won't demand money from you.
Description.Korean: If you destroyed many ships/buildings of AI/pirates and it is asking for CeaseFire/Peace, it won't demand money from you.
